tool_description: Nudity Shield  is a powerful tool that allows you to analyze images and determine if their content is potentially inappropriate or NSFW (Not Safe for Work). Designed to be easy to use and integrate into web, mobile, or cloud applications, Nudity Shield utilizes advanced visual content detection algorithms to automatically identify and classify images.
name: Nudity Shield
title: Nudity Shield

api_list.name: Classify
api_list.description:
To use this endpoint, you need to send an HTTP POST request with a body that contains a key "image" and the corresponding value as the base64 representation of the image you want to classify. The server will process the request and return a response indicating whether the image is safe or unsafe.

It's important to note that the value of the "image" key is expected to be a valid base64 representation of the image. Additionally, it is recommended that the images are of reasonable size and comply with common image formats such as JPEG or PNG to achieve better classification results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nudity-shield.p.rapidapi.com/classify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nudity-shield.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nudity-shield.p.rapidapi.com/classify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nudity-shield.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
